head.title: NOVELL PROFIT IS UP, BUT NOT SALES

hedline.hl1: NOVELL PROFIT IS UP, BUT NOT SALES

abstract.p: Novell Inc says earnings in third quarter ended July 31 were $8.6 million, down 82 percent from $49.3 million in year-earlier period; sales fell 17 percent, to $270 million from $326.8 million; graph (S)

block.p: Novell reported third-quarter earnings yesterday that exceeded analysts' estimates by a penny a share, but the networking software company's sales slipped relative to a year earlier. For the quarter ended July 31, Novell reported earnings of $8.6 million, or 3 cents a diluted share, down 82 percent from $49.3 million, or 14 cents a share, in 1999. Sales fell 17 percent, to $270.0 million from $326.8 million.
